author: Mike Miller 812-331-4369 | mmiller@heraldt.com
title: Elston added as development coach
text:
Elston added as development coach By Mike Miller 812-331-4369 | mmiller@heraldt.com heraldtimesonline.com | 0 comments 
Derek Elston spent his college years blindly preparing for the job Indiana officially assigned to him on Monday. 
Elston, IU's new director of player development, was the glue that helped the Hoosiers build toward their Big Ten championship in 2013, and his contributions behind the scenes were as important, if not more so, than anything he did on the court.
